A

add_field(String, String, String, String) - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
This is the real work horse of the IndexLoader.
add_xml_field(String, NodeIterator, String, String) - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
Similar to add_field, but instead of accepting a text field as arguement it takes a XSLT node-set.

C

close_document() - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
Closes the current Lucene document.
close_index() - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
This method used to close the index and optimize it.

D

delete_documents(String, String) - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
Deletes all Lucene documents in the index which have "dataSourceId" stored in "dataSourceField".
dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer - package dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer
 
Driver - Class in dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer
This is a utility for indexing XML documents, using the Xalan XSLT processor with java extensions, such that text is added to a Lucene index (http://lucene.apache.org/) through XSLT functions defined in Java.
Driver() - Constructor for class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.Driver

encode_uri(String) - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
 

I

IndexLoader - Class in dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer
This class is the glue between the Xalan XSLT processor and Lucene.
IndexLoader() - Constructor for class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.Driver
Most of the processing takes place in the main method.

O

open_document() - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
Creates a new Lucene document.
open_index(String, String, String) - Method in class dk.kb.dup.xsltIndexer.IndexLoader
This method tells the IndexLoader to open an index using a given mode (update or create) in the directory given as an argument either of the --update or --create in the command line.
